channel.title: Penguins win the Stanley Cup
channel.description:
Pittsburgh Penguins vs. Detroit Red Wings, the penguins took it 2-1.
Amazing game, the last minute was one of the most intense moments I've felt when it comes to Hockey. I love both teams, but I'm glad Pittsburgh won.
Well anyways I've been excited for this game all day and I'm wasted as hell. Peace out Hockey fans discuss.

item.title: Penguins win the Stanley Cup
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

It was a good game. Awesome how they took it all the way to game seven.
Crosby didn’t even do shit after he got slammed into the boards…

Read full topic

It’s really boring, but to each his own.[/quote]

I don’t know any males who are not obsessed with hockey where I live lol.

I suppose you think watching golf is boring too…

item.title: Penguins win the Stanley Cup
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“Tico135, post:4, topic:283502”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=374663.msg2824541#msg2824541 date=1244867770]
Thank god the Pens won (I’m from Pittsburgh so it would kinda suck if we lost to Detroit 2 years in a row).
[/quote]

Penguins are for fanboys. Everyone jumps on the bandwagon because they have Sidney Crosby. Detroit killed them last year, and they’re still the better team. Kudos to the Penguins for actually winning, but Detroit is a much better team.[/quote]
Hey, don’t say I jumped on the Penguins bandwagon. The fact that I live 20-30 mins outside of Pittsburgh gives me a pass on that. Crosby isn’t that great either.

[quote=“jme, post:5, topic:283502”][quote author=Tico135 link=topic=374663.msg2824551#msg2824551 date=1244868317]

Thank god the Pens won (I’m from Pittsburgh so it would kinda suck if we lost to Detroit 2 years in a row).

Penguins are for fanboys. Everyone jumps on the bandwagon because they have Sidney Crosby. Detroit killed them last year, and they’re still the better team. Kudos to the Penguins for actually winning, but Detroit is a much better team.
[/quote]

I honestly don’t like Sidney Crosby much, I hate how people say “he won the stanley cup.” I like them for a weird reason, they are probably the first team I ever liked a lot, when I was young. So I couldn’t help but still kinda cheer for them. Detriot is a great team though and I love them too. I really thought that in the last 2 seconds they were gonna score I was about to shit myself. OT would have been intense as hell![/quote]
If he won the Stanley Cup, then why did Malkin get MVP? I would have loved to see Detroit win that game tbh. The Penguins didn’t do nearly as much as they could. In Pittsburgh we call that a “Bill Cowher lets run the clock out instead of trying to gain a lead” technique.

Read full topic

item.title: Penguins win the Stanley Cup
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Tico135, post:4, topic:283502”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=374663.msg2824541#msg2824541 date=1244867770]
Thank god the Pens won (I’m from Pittsburgh so it would kinda suck if we lost to Detroit 2 years in a row).
[/quote]

Penguins are for fanboys. Everyone jumps on the bandwagon because they have Sidney Crosby. Detroit killed them last year, and they’re still the better team. Kudos to the Penguins for actually winning, but Detroit is a much better team.[/quote]

I honestly don’t like Sidney Crosby much, I hate how people say “he won the stanley cup.” I like them for a weird reason, they are probably the first team I ever liked a lot, when I was young. So I couldn’t help but still kinda cheer for them. Detriot is a great team though and I love them too. I really thought that in the last 2 seconds they were gonna score I was about to shit myself. OT would have been intense as hell!

Read full topic
